name: cypress-project
description: This code is for Amazon automation testing as part of my personal knowledge. It's written in Cypress/js and has everything needed to run in just a few steps.
author: Jocselyn Zumbado Chartier

scripts.posttest: npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate
scripts.report:generate: npx marg cypress/reports/full-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports/html --reportPageTitle "Reporte de pruebas automatizadas - $(date +'%d/%m/%Y %H:%M')" --inline
